dir.description: The reading direction of the toolbar If omitted, inherits globally from DirectionProvider or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.

loop.description: When true, keyboard navigation will loop from last tab to first, and vice versa.

as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
